means: 模仿( ape的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: We watched two apes grooming each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们看两只猩猩在互相理毛.

sentence.Network_en: Chimpanzees and gorillas are both apes.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑猩猩和大猩猩都是类人猿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: they were interested in the evolution of language and the linguistic capabilities of great apes .他们对于大猩猩的说话和语言的进化能力非常感兴趣。

recent experiments with a young chimpanzee seem to show that while apes are incapable of learning spoken language , they can assimilate and utilize some elements of the sign language deaf-mutes employ .最近以一头年轻黑猩猩所做的实验显示，猿类动物没有学习口说语言的能力，但能吸收和使用与聋哑人士沟通的手语。
The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos ., 所有的猿类中最具攻击性的是倭黑猩猩.

the plantaris muscle is used by animals in gripping and manipulating with their feet-something you see with apes who seem to be able to use their feet as well as their hands .在动物中，跖肌的作用是抓住和控制脚上的东西，你可以在猩猩身上看到这点，他们的脚和手一样灵活。

entry.def: Apes are chimpanzees, gorillas, and other animals in the same family.

example.ex: ...the theory that man is descended from the apes.
example.tran: 认为人类是从类人猿演变而来的理论

entry.def: If you ape someone's speech or behaviour, you imitate it.

example.ex: Modelling yourself on someone you admire is not the same as aping all they say or do.
example.tran: 以偶像为榜样并不是说要模仿他们的一言一行。
只是照搬好莱坞模式的法国电影

entry.def: If someone goes ape, they become very angry and upset.

example.ex: When Colonel Harper found out, he would go ape.
example.tran: 哈珀上校发现了一定会勃然大怒。
